column2: "Asɛm a nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia kaa kyerɛɛ Neria ba Baruk
column3: ber a ɔkyerɛɛw nsɛm yi fii Jeremia anomu hyɛɛ nwoma mu wɔ Josia ba Jehoiakim n’afe a otsia anan no mu
Afei mundue! Na EWURADZE dze awerɛhow aka me yaw ho; maberɛ na m’apensi
Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Hwɛ
column7: metutu; na iyi besi asaase no nyinara do."

column2: "Na erohwehwɛ ndzɛmba akɛse ama woho anaa? Mma nnhwehwɛ: na
column4: medze mbusu bɛba adasamba nyinara do
column5: EWURADZE na ɔse: na medze mo nkwa bɛma wo ayɛ afonam wɔ mbea a erokɔ do nyinara do."
